RECENT PUBLICATIONS

  1. S. K. Srivastava, A. K. Srivastava, O. Adesope, A. R. Minerick, and N. Schulz, “Analyzing self-reported challenges and preferences for enhancing recruitment and retention of international female graduate engineering students”, Journal of women and minorities in science and engineering, vol. 19, no. 3, pp. 185-208, October 2013.
  2. Soumya K. Srivastava, Anurag K. Srivastava, Adrienne R. Minerick, and Noel N. Schulz, “Recruitment and Retention of International Graduate Students in U.S. Universities”, International Journal of Engineering Education, vol. 26, no. 6, pp.1561-1574, December, 2010.
